io.proximax.sdk.model.transaction

Class ModifyContractTransaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.proximax.sdk.model.transaction.Transaction
      • io.proximax.sdk.model.transaction.ModifyContractTransaction

  • public class ModifyContractTransaction
extends Transaction

    Contract modification transaction can be used to create or change contract

    Contract changes contract account to N of N multisignature account where cosignatories are the verifiers

    • Field Summary

      • ModifyContractTransaction

        public ModifyContractTransaction(NetworkType networkType,
                                 java.lang.Integer transactionVersion,
                                 TransactionDeadline deadline,
                                 java.math.BigInteger maxFee,
                                 java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> signature,
                                 java.util.Optional<PublicAccount> signer,
                                 java.util.Optional<TransactionInfo> transactionInfo,
                                 java.math.BigInteger durationDelta,
                                 java.lang.String contentHash,
                                 java.util.List<MultisigCosignatoryModification> customersModifications,
                                 java.util.List<MultisigCosignatoryModification> executorsModifications,
                                 java.util.List<MultisigCosignatoryModification> verifiersModifications)
        create new contract modification transaction
        Parameters:
        networkType - network type
        transactionVersion - version of the transaction
        deadline - transaction deadline
        maxFee - maximum fee
        signature - optional transaction signature
        signer - optional signer of the transaction
        transactionInfo - optional transaction info
        durationDelta - change of the contract duration (+/-)
        contentHash - contract content hash
        customersModifications - changes to the list of customers
        executorsModifications - changes to the list of executors
        verifiersModifications - changes to the list of verifiers
